projects.name: TIL
projects.description: For our project in the 1st Annual Nashville Software School Skill++ 24-Hour Hackathon, we created TIL (Today I Learned) which is an app to post anything new you've learned about tech. It was built with an Angular 1.6 Front-End, Elixir Back-End, and also features a Slack app that allows you to post, search, and control the app through your Slack team. My role on the team was Front-End developer, designing the UI & styles with Materialize as our framework
